title: Week-1
description: Starting internship with my friend Tueytep Thumma...
data: Starting internship with my friend Tueytep Thummawong at studio twist main office. First morning setup environment for work at office. and Design work flow with 'Intregration test' for RUSHS platform with my backend team (I work part time since before the internship)

title: Week-2
description: Coding and Testing intragration test and unit test...
data: Coding and Testing intragration test and unit test with GO LANGUAGE [Go (programming language)]. Go is a statically typed, compiled programming language designed at Google It is syntactically similar to C, but with memory safety, garbage collection, structural typing, and CSP-style concurrency. It is often referred to as Golang because of its former domain name, golang.org, but its proper name is Go.

title: Week-3
description: Coding and Testing intragration test and unit test...
data: Coding and Testing intragration test and unit test and deploy with develop environment by feature such as CRUD apis (create, read, update, delete), LINE notification apis, Create order with POS, LIFF, Woocomerce apis etc.

title: Week-5
description: Fixed Bugs Generate Barcode with SKU in RUSHS...
data: Fixed the bug of creating barcodes with sku codes in Rushs system that were already done for customers who use the service and write an Intregration Test to avoid any errors in terms of the size of the barcode. Barcode type and page setup until the document printer

title: Week-6
description: Setup BIVOCOM Router use with CCTV for pump in...
data: Setup BIVOCOM Router use with CCTV for pump in Bangkok. BIVOCOM is IoT Gateways Tailor-designed for industrial applications require collecting, processing, storing the data at the edge, as well as high speed, seamless and secure communication with field devices. My work's configuration BIVOCOM port, user admin, connect 4g and connect with CCTV.

title: Week-7
data: Complete setup, configuration and testing BIVOCOM before sent to customer
